text: eṉavē (ivvamāṉitattiṟku māṟu ceyyum) muṉāḥpikkāṉa āṇ; kaḷaiyum;, muṉāḥpikkāṉa peṇkaḷaiyum;, muṣrikkāṉa āṇkaḷaiyum, muṣrikkāṉa peṇkaḷaiyum niccayamāka allāh vētaṉai ceyvāṉ; (āṉāl ivvamāṉitattai matittu naṭakkum) muḥmiṉāṉa āṇkaḷaiyum, muḥmiṉāṉa peṇkaḷaiyum (avarkaḷ tavpāvai ēṟṟu) maṉṉikkiṉṟāṉ. Allāh mika maṉṉippavaṉ; mikka aṉpuṭaiyavaṉ
